page.title: 05Cromford Hill
page.content: People who live on{Cromford Hill endure a lot of{noise}from the traffic but they become used to it after a while. They put it to the back of their minds. Lorries are the{noisiest vehicles. They come down at{4 or 5am. in the morning from what used to be Dene Quarry but is now Tarmac. People on the Hill get lots of{dust } especially through their windows.They {dust}but five minutes later they have to{dust}again. It gets worse in the summer. People who have had the experience of living near{Cromford {Hill}would not live near the road again. There was a{very bad acceident} on The Hill on August 2nd 1979.{A {runaway lorry demolished the crash {barriers, smashed up two cars and {ended in the wall of Number 86.
